t: Mastermind Kōld Brew – Mastermind Kold Brew
s: Owned and operated by mechanical engineers, we design highly engineered and tested products that are extremely innovative in their markets. We are currently focusing on the world of coffee, developing a cold brewing coffee kit that will certainly change the industry.

The Kōld Brewer is more than just a tumbler with a filter, it's going to be an integral part of your lifestyle. Mastermind designed it to go everywhere with you. Created by a mechanical engineer and tested by businessmen, baristas, coffee roasters, and outdoorsman, you'll find it sleek, durable, ...
